comments.body:

Is this just going to keep happening every day?

Yes. Sorry.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: They don’t appear in the whitelist queue until someone’s completed them. For normal achievements, there’s an additional caveat that a request to /v2/account/achievements will automatically whitelist any results — but dailies are not current returned from that endpoint, so they’ll probably only appear around 10:30AM PST Mon-Fri :/

comments.author: Chieftain Alex.2851
comments.body:
Well that’s good news, I saw the achievement names popup very soon after you replied.

Do you have to whitelist the new achievements on the day that they first turn up? I’m not sure if it’s intentional or not, but today’s special dailies aren’t whitelisted either – but perhaps this is deliberate. (Today’s: 2841,2848,2852,2854,2863,2888)

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
This is normal — there’s a manual whitelist step before new stuff can show up on the API.

They should start appearing later today.

comments.author: Chieftain Alex.2851
comments.body:
Per the title, it appears that the SAB daily achievements aren’t yet showing up in the achievements API despite being listed on “achievements/daily”.

Dailies: https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements/daily?lang=en

Example SAB: https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements?lang=en&ids=2870
